---
title: "Protocol Version History"
---

This page contains a detailed description of how the Nested RF Protocols have evolved over time. It includes a timeline of changes and comparisons of the different parameters used in each version.

___________________________________________________________________________

## Parameter Overview 

### Protocol 1 Parameter Comparison

Side-by-side comparison of all Protocol 1 versions, highlighting the key parameter differences.

| Parameter | Early Testing | RNAi (Dec-Jan) | DS (Apr-May) | T4/T5 (Jul-Nov) | Pharmacology (Nov-Dec) |
|:----------|:--------------|:---------------|:--------------|:----------------|:-----------------------|
| **Date range** | Nov 27 - Dec 12, 2024 | Dec 13, 2024 - Jan 23, 2025 | Apr 8 - May 9, 2025 | Jul 10 - Nov 2025 | Nov 14 - Dec 2025 |
| **Screen side** | LHS | LHS | RHS | LHS | LHS |
| **Pixel range (x)** | 17:112 | 17:112 | 97:196/81:180 | 17:112 | 17:112 |
| **Flash sizes** | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 6px only |
| **Flash duration** | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms |
| **Inter-flash interval** | 50ms | 50ms | 50ms | 150ms | 150ms |
| **Background intensity** | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (4/15) | gs_val=4 (4/15) |
| **Flash contrasts** | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF |
| **Repetitions** | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 |
| **Sampling rate** | 20 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz |
: {.bordered}

::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 1 Changes Over Time

1. **Dec 2024:** Changed from 20kHz to 10kHz sampling rate
2. **Apr 2025:** Switched from LHS to RHS for DS Probe experiments
3. **Jul 2025:** Increased inter-flash interval from 50ms to 150ms; changed background from 6/15 to 4/15
4. **Nov 2025:** Removed 12px flashes for pharmacology experiments (6px only)
:::

| **4px duration** | 160ms, 80ms | 160ms, 80ms | 160ms | 160ms | - |
| **4px interval** | 340ms, 170ms | 340ms, 170ms | 440ms | 440ms | - |
| **6px flashes** | No | No | Yes | Yes | No |
| **6px duration** | - | - | 160ms | 160ms | - |
| **6px interval** | - | - | 440ms | 440ms | - |

### Bar Flash Parameters

| Parameter | RNAi | DS Probe | T4/T5 Summer | T4/T5 Autumn | Pharmacology |
|:----------|:-----|:----|:---------|:-------------|:-------------|
| **80ms bar flashes** | - | - | - | Yes (920ms interval) | Yes (920ms interval) |
| **14ms bar flashes** |  - | - | - | Yes (486ms interval) | Yes (486ms interval) |
| **Number of positions** | - | - | - |  11 | 11 |
| **Position spacing** |  - | - | - | 1px (Oct 15-23), 2px (Oct 23+) | 2px |


### Timing Parameters

| Parameter | RNAi | DS Probe | T4/T5 Summer | T4/T5 Autumn | Pharmacology |
|:--------------|:-----|:----|:--------|:---------|:--------|
| **10s background at start** | No | Yes (from May 6) | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| **10s background between reps** | No | Yes (from May 6) | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| **3s background between stimuli** | No | No | No | Yes (from Oct 21) | Yes |


::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 2 Changes Over Time

1. **May 6th 2025:** Added 10s background intervals between repetitions amd at the start of the protocol.
2. **July 2025:** Changed the background intensity from 6/15 to 4/15.
3. **Oct 2025:** Added 168 dps sweeps and bar flashes (80ms and 14ms) to the protocol.
4. **Oct 2025:** Introduced a 3s background interval between stimulus blocks for easier data parsing.
5. **Oct 23rd 2025:** Changed bar flash position spacing from 1px to 2px increments.
6. **Nov 2025:** Removed square flashes for pharmacology experiments, focusing solely on bar sweeps and flashes. Added 2 faster speeds. 
:::

| Nov 14 - Dec 2025 | Pharmacology | 6px flashes only | `protocol1/bkg4/protocol1_10kHz_4reps_6pxONLY_LHS_2sbkg_ 200msfl_150msint_11-14-25_13-47-30/` |
